document.full_text: snipers firing from rooftops killed a yemeni anti-government demonstrator on tuesday in a city that has seen some of the largest protests against president ali abdullah saleh, witnesses and a medical source said.
document.title: one killed after yemen protest hit by sniper fire
lines_and_colors: snipers firing from rooftops killed a yemeni anti-government demonstrator on tuesday in a city that has seen some of the largest protests against president ali abdullah saleh, witnesses and a medical source said.
